title: Inside the Mind of a Cat
description:
Meow! Tig and Cheryl explore their feline sides as they leap into "Inside the Mind of a Cat," Netflix's documentary about the most mysterious of household pets. Our doc duo has VERY different reactions to the film, but you'll have to listen to find out who's purring, and who's hissing about this groundbreaking entry into the True Story canon!

BUY TICKETS TO OUR LIVE SHOW, SEPT 22: https://app.loopedlive.com/b/8536

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
